features: 【Computer Desk】The Oapety multifunctional computer table is suitable for house, office, and home office. It can be used by both adults and children. Top shelves can storage books, files and stationeries.

【Sturdy Structure and Premium Board】Oapety ladder computer desk is constructed with high- temperature painting rust proof square steel tube frame and 3/5 inch thickness environmental-friendly particle board. The strong trapezoidal structure keeps the table a large load capacity.

【Ample Space and Multipurpose】The size of the table board is 28x18 inches. Ample space for necessary objects such as notebook, books, phone and glass. Suitable for study, reading, do homework and work.
【Easy to Set Up】Package includes detailed instructions and all required accessories. Come with free hex wrenches. You only need 15-30 minutes to assemble the table.

【Size and Load Capacity】The size of the total desk table is 28x18x57.5 inches. The height of the desktop is 30 inches. The maximum safe load of the desktop is 50 lbs, the maximum safe load of the top shelf is 15 lbs. And the weight of the table is 21.16 lbs.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Computer Desk with Power Outlet About Oapety: Oapety is a company specializing in interior furniture products. We have devoted ourselves to the furniture industry for 10 years. Mainly engaged in tables, desks, shelves, flower rack and other kinds of furniture. We have our own R&D team and production team, has been focusing on furniture research, design and sales, always committed to promoting elegant and warm home design concept, and its professional design, excellent quality, in-depth brand concept to win the favor of the consumer. Multipurpose: Study This desk is a small desk for one person. It is very suitable to be placed in a relatively small study, suitable for study and work. Help you create a quiet and comfortable environment. Living Room Place this desk in the living room, at leisure time, you can sit down to read books. It also can be used as a shelf to place some daily necessities. Bedroom Place this desk beside the bed, before you go to bed or wake up, sit at your desk and read or work for a while. Small desk won't take up too much space and won't make the room seem crowded.

Details: Easy to Set Up Package includes detailed instructions and all required accessories. Come with free hex wrenches. You only need 5-10 minutes to assemble the desk. Sturdy Steel Construction Constructed with rust proof square steel tube frame. This ensures the desk strong enough and the maximum capacityof the esktop is 50 pounds. High Quality Particle Board This computer desk is crafted with high quality particle board. 3/5 inch thickness of the board tabletop. Waterproof and easy to clean. Scratch-Resistant The leveling feet pads is made of plastic. It can protect the floor well and prevent the floor from being scratched.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect small space college room desk
reviews.reviewText: It was difficult to find a desk for my college student’s space in his new room. He had exactly 30 inch wide cubby space in a dormer, and this desk fit perfectly. Easy setup and sturdy. He’s very pleased with it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for small spaces!
reviews.reviewText: Not only is this desk super cute it’s really good for small spaces. I don’t have a big room and I did some research and found this one. It fits perfect and it has plenty of space for doing work. It was easy to put together but I’m pretty good at putting together Amazon furniture. Only thing is is that it wables a little but it could have been due to putting it together too fast lol. Other than that it’s great!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Perfect fit for a bedroom
reviews.reviewText: I needed a desk for my computer and this was the perfect size for a small bedroom, just the right fit. It was easy to assemble didn’t have any misaligned holes. The only thing missing was the charging station they sent me the desk without that piece, same price for the one with the charging station. But I liked it without it because I can use the whole table space.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to assemble
reviews.reviewText: We're excited to use it. Looks great

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Good for small places!
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Love this little desk, it’s just right for my small apartment but only con is … I ordered the desk with outlets & received the regular one.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for small spaces
reviews.reviewText: Perfect for small spaces if you need a place to read . It’s doesn’t have much space for storage or shelves, but the power supply is handy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Missing Power Outlet/ USB Charging Port
reviews.reviewText: I ordered the desk with the power outlet/USB charging ports and it did not come with that. Very disappointing. The only “resolution” is to take it apart and send it back. What about the 2 hours I already spent building it? I should be able to at least get a discount for my inconvenience. It’s otherwise sturdy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for a small nook
reviews.reviewText: So it was mostly easy to build... at a certain point I felt like there were a few unnecessary pieces. But it only took me about 30-45 mins to assemble & fit brilliantly into the small space in front of my window which I turned into a computer nook. I needed something that was narrow but deep enough to accommodate a large laptop. From the looks of it, I'm guessing it could just fit all the necessities of a desktop with a 20-inch monitor, keyboard, & mouse. The upper shelf is a great height for speakers, but be careful putting liquids up there as the unit does move slightly with rapid keystrokes, & bumping it will cause mayhem. But it's both inexpensive & great quality. The wood is sealed & a good-quality weight. Overall, I love this piece.
